patterns:
44 240 CCT MLA Type AND Selections AND 505 OR Analytical CAM
(some $item in $ListVMusicCCT_MLA_Type_Plural satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., $item)]) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='240'][ marc:sufield[@code='n' or @code='p'] ] ) and ( marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='k'][(contains(., 'Selections'))] ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='500']) or exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')][@ind2='2']) )
-->
